actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to preclude telephone rate increases as a result of the break-up of A.T.&T.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the proposed divestiture of the American Telephone and Telegraph Company be examined with a view toward protecting: (1) telephone users from rate increases; (2) the interests of Bell System shareholders; and (3) the viability of local operating companies. Directs the General Accounting Office to begin a report to Congress on the likely effects of the proposed divestiture. Calls for the abandonment of the proposed divestiture if the public interest would not be served.

titles.title: A resolution to preclude telephone rate increases as a result of the break-up of A.T.&T.
